Module ePJ2
Package ePJ2

Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
ePJ2.Vehicle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Car, ElectricBike, Scooter
public abstract class Vehicle extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a vehicle. This class defines common properties and behaviors for all vehicles.
See Also:

      model - The model of the vehicle.
      price - The price of the vehicle.
